version.name: v1
version.xform: <xf:xforms xmlns:xf="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xf:model> <xf:instance id="deliverynotify-jf"> <deliverynotify-jf name="Delivery Notification-v1" id="97"> <staffId/> <facilityId/> <motechId/> <datetime/> <formtype>data_entry</formtype> <formname>deliverynotify-jf</formname> </deliverynotify-jf> </xf:instance> <xf:bind id="staffId" nodeset="/deliverynotify-jf/staffId" type="xsd:int" required="true()"/> <xf:bind id="facilityId" nodeset="/deliverynotify-jf/facilityId" type="xsd:int" required="true()"/> <xf:bind id="motechId" nodeset="/deliverynotify-jf/motechId" type="xsd:int" required="true()"/> <xf:bind id="datetime" nodeset="/deliverynotify-jf/datetime" type="xsd:dateTime" required="true()" constraint=". <= 'today()'" message="Invalid date: date specified is in the future"/> <xf:bind id="formtype" nodeset="/deliverynotify-jf/formtype" type="xsd:string" required="true()" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind id="formname" nodeset="/deliverynotify-jf/formname" type="xsd:string" required="true()" visible="false()"/> </xf:model> <xf:group id="1"> <xf:label>Page1</xf:label> <xf:input bind="staffId"> <xf:label>Staff ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="facilityId"> <xf:label>Facility ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="motechId"> <xf:label>MoTeCH ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="datetime"> <xf:label>Date of delivery</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="formtype"> <xf:label>formType</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="formname"> <xf:label>formName</xf:label> </xf:input> </xf:group> </xf:xforms>

versionText.xform: <xform id="97"> <text xpath="xforms/model/instance/deliverynotify-jf[@name]" value="Delivery Notification-v1"/> <text xpath="xforms/group[@id='1']/label" value="Page1"/> <text xpath="xforms/group[@id='1']/input[@bind='staffId']/label" value="Staff ID"/> <text xpath="xforms/group[@id='1']/input[@bind='facilityId']/label" value="Facility ID"/> <text xpath="xforms/group[@id='1']/input[@bind='motechId']/label" value="MoTeCH ID"/> <text xpath="xforms/group[@id='1']/input[@bind='datetime']/label" value="Date of delivery"/> <text xpath="xforms/group[@id='1']/input[@bind='formtype']/label" value="formType"/> <text xpath="xforms/group[@id='1']/input[@bind='formname']/label" value="formName"/> <text xpath="xforms/model/bind[@id='datetime'][@message]" value="Invalid date: date specified is in the future"/> </xform>
